Description: Faience scarab; pierced longitudinally; engraved head and legs and on base prenomen of Ramses III; poorly preserved.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Enkomi
Bibliographic references: Jacobsson 1994 / Aegyptiaca from Late Bronze Age Cyprus (No. 257)
Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (2343)
Kenna 1971 / Catalogue of the Cypriote Seals of the Bronze Age in the British Museum (No. 111)
Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (P41, Pl IV)
Peltenburg 1986 / Ramesside Egypt and Cyprus (P. 164, No.2)
